name: Garuda's Thunder
description:
Controls:
- Aim with the mouse
- Left click to shoot


Kill the evil enemy Nagas with chain lightning bolts as the ancient god Garuda.


Team members:

  • Boris Karavasilev (programming)
  • Mikkel Lamhauge (programming / level design)
  • Mathias Jensen (VFX, sound design)
  • Vladyslav Yefremov (3D art)
  • Jamie Christensen (programming)
